'''''A Elbereth Gilthoniel!'' 1, no. 2''' is an issue of the fanzine/newsletter ''A Elbereth Gilthoniel!'' published by the Fellowship of Middle Earth (a [[Tolkien fandom
Cover of unknown issue of ''A Elbereth G: Monash University]]). Included is an article containing the first 19 lines of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s poem "[[Doworst]]" (p. 3).<ref name=RG>{{CG
